'''''Amon Hen'' 248''' is the two-hundred-and-forty-eighth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in August [[2014]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[Thorin|King Under the Mountain]]''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Dates for your Diary
* Announcements
* The Burning Palantír 8
** By: Ian Collier
* All Brân
** By: Ian Spittlehouse
* [[Hall of Fire]]
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill/Verne Walker
* Oxonmoot 2014 Update
** By: Lyn Wilshire
* Tolkien: ''Sigurd and Gudrun, Fall of Arthur, Beowulf''
** By: All Brân/Ian Spittlehouse
* Artwork: ''[[Legolas]]''
** By: Chris Bell
* Orophin dreams of the Waters of Awakening Part One
** By: David Marley
* I Small It in the Air
** By: Mark Bednarowski
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Ian Collier
* Meadhalls and Medwed
** By: Mick Henry
* Review: ''The Hobbit - An Art Book by Octo''
** By: [[Ruth Lacon]]''
* Review: ''[[Ainulindale (band)|Ainulindalë]] - Nevrast''
** By: Michael Cunningham
* Mathom
** By: Jan Boom
* New Members
* News From [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* Artwork: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien|JRRT]] WW1''
** By: Gordon Palmer
* Letters
* Christopher's Clippings
** By: Christopher Kreuzer
* Artwork: ''Into the Wild''
** By: Jef Murray
* Committee
